dcterms:creator: Researchers and clinicians at VinBrain, JSC
University Medical Center at Ho Chi Minh City
dcterms:description: A clinical dataset containing contrast-enhanced 3-phase CT scans of the liver from 354 subjects, annotated and rated by two radiologists with extensive experience in liver oncology.
dcterms:title: Liver Lesion Dataset

dcterms:creator: B.H. Menze

Y. Burren

R. Wiest
dcterms:description: The BraTS19 dataset contains MRI scans of the brain from 484 subjects for the purpose of brain tumor segmentation, with 4 multi-contrast scans per subject.
dcterms:title: BraTS19 Dataset
